title: Historic Chic Duplex with Modern Touches in Pila Suburb
description: Embrace historic character in this beautifully crafted duplex offers 4 spacious bedrooms and 3 modern bathrooms across 172 sqm. Blending classic charm with high-tech comfort, this residence features modern facade design fitted perfectly with underfloor heating throughout. Generous and light-filled living spaces are ideal for gatherings and everyday elegance at home.
neighborhood_description: Situated in Pila's tranquil Suburb, a low-urban neighborhood, you’ll find the peace of green surroundings matched with fast highway access for optimal convenience. The area is growing into a tech-oriented enclave, drawing smart investors and families seeking potential value and privacy alike. Easy reach to city amenities while removed from rush and bustle ensures a unique blend of old-world peace and modern practices.
lifestyle_benefits: opportunity for investment in a developing tech-oriented area
tranquil ambiance ideal for long-term tenancy
proximity to highways for business travel and easy city access
target_buyer: Ideal for savvy property investors attracted to emerging neighborhoods with long-term upside and convenience — families, renters, or professionals valuing both tech and tradition.
market_positioning: Poised as a fusion between elegant historical architecture and ultimate modern convenience, this duplex occupies a rare niche: blending timeless character and valuable high-tech infrastructure in one of Pila’s intriguing suburban prospects.
